item.title: Email outage
item.description: [Post copied from https://datasci.social/@mszll/109374854036872933] We had a slight hiccup at datasci.social with our email provider in the last ~16 hours which has been resolved now. (Was due to #TwitterMigration) Sorry for any delays in receiving system emails, like for sign-up. #mastoadmin #serverinfo
